config.query: SELECT * FROM (SELECT sm.pid, rr.[ID] id, rr.[CUST_ID] cifNumber, rr.[RISK_SCORE] riskScore, rr.[RISK_CATEGORY] riskCategory, rr.[DATE_OF_RISK_SCORE] riskScoreCreationDate, rr.[EXPIRY_DATE_OF_RISK_SCORE] riskScoreExpiryDate, rr.[MODIFIED_DATE] modifiedDate, rc.[Cash_Intensive_Flag] cashIntensiveFlag, rc.[REG_REPORT_ONE] regReportOne FROM [UAT_CUST_RISK_SCORING].[dbo].[riskRating] rr INNER JOIN [ENGAWA,1600].[MDM].[C360].[C360_GOLDENCUSTOMERSYSTEMMAPPING] sm ON rr.CUST_ID COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT = sm.ID_Number COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND sm.ID_Type = 'FCRMID' LEFT JOIN [UAT_CUST_RISK_SCORING].[dbo].[riskRatingCashReg] rc ON rr.CUST_ID COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT = rc.CRMID COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT) AS riskRating
config.incrementing.column.name: id
config.timestamp.column.name: modifiedDate
config.dialect.name: SqlServerDatabaseDialect
